English: Can I buy you a drink?

Mexican Spanish: La estoy pasando muy bien contigo
English: I'm having a great time with you

Mexican Spanish: Me encanta tu sentido del humor
English: I love your sense of humor
Would you like to go out with me?

I enjoy spending time with you.

Mexican Spanish: ¿Qué te gusta hacer en tu tiempo libre?
English: What do you like to do in your free time?

Mexican Spanish: ¿Te gustaría ir a cenar esta noche?
English: Would you like to go to dinner tonight?
Thank you for being so wonderful.
Do you want to watch a movie?
I really like being with you.
Would you like to go for a walk?
